text: shahru ramadana alladhi unzila fihi l-qur'anu hudan lilnnasi wabayyinatin mina l-huda wal-fur'qani faman shahida minkumu l-shahra falyasum'hu waman kana maridan aw ʿala safarin faʿiddatun min ayyamin ukhara yuridu l-lahu bikumu l-yus'ra wala yuridu bikumu l-ʿus'ra walituk'milu l-ʿidata walitukabbiru l-laha ʿala ma hadakum walaʿallakum tashkuruna
